channel.title: Official Rune-Navia Release 24/7 VPS
channel.description:
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/10zcz69.png[/img]
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Forums[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]PlayNow[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Download Client[/url] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Vote[/url]
Rune-Navia's Economy is based off of Skilling and Pking, However that is not all we have. Rune-Navia has over 10 Custom Minigame and every skill is trainable. We don't stop there... We a wide variety of bosses for great PVM including: Nex, Nomad, Godwars, and other custom Bosses which you'll have to play to find out.
[size=1.35em]Server features: [/size] -Much better Combat! -Flawless Switching -Hunter -Dungeoneering -Ancient Curses -Quick prays -FullScreen -Full Summoning! -Full GodWars -Full Nex with each 4 minnions -Pk Point System -toggle 10x hits on or off -Full Godwars(all bosses) -All prayers work -Working LootShare -Many Monsters to train on -Working Vengance -Full autocasting on magic -Constant Updates -Staff Of Light -24 skills -Full Pvp weapons -All Specials Work -Working wilderness obelisk teleporters -Many Shops -Full functioning Clan Chat -Perfect Hybriding -All Skills Work!!! -Full dueling -Full pest control -Full Assault -Full Fight pits -Dragon Defender -All nex armours
[size=1.35em]Minigames: [/size] - Assault - Recipe for Disaster - Nomad and Angry Goblin - Warriors Guild - Fight Caves - Pest Control - Barrows - Duel Arena - Fight Pits
[size=1.35em]Media: More coming soon. [/size]
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/35hllw7.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/xkzmdh.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/30mxq50.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/331fwxx.png[/img]

item.title: Official Rune-Navia Release 24/7 VPS
item.dc:creator: @rune-navia rune-navia
item.description:
@rune-navia wrote:

                                                  [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Forums[/url]
                                                  [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]PlayNow[/url]
                                                  [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Download Client[/url]
                                                  [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Vote[/url]

Rune-Navia’s Economy is based off of Skilling and Pking, However that is not all we have. Rune-Navia has over 10 Custom Minigame and every skill is trainable. We don’t stop there… We a wide variety of bosses for great PVM including: Nex, Nomad, Godwars, and other custom Bosses which you’ll have to play to find out.

[size=1.35em]Server features:
[/size]
-Much better Combat!
-Flawless Switching
-Hunter
-Dungeoneering
-Ancient Curses
-Quick prays
-FullScreen
-Full Summoning!
-Full GodWars
-Full Nex with each 4 minnions
-Pk Point System
-toggle 10x hits on or off
-Full Godwars(all bosses)
-All prayers work
-Working LootShare
-Many Monsters to train on
-Working Vengance
-Full autocasting on magic
-Constant Updates
-Staff Of Light
-24 skills
-Full Pvp weapons
-All Specials Work
-Working wilderness obelisk teleporters
-Many Shops
-Full functioning Clan Chat
-Perfect Hybriding
-All Skills Work!!!
-Full dueling
-Full pest control
-Full Assault
-Full Fight pits
-Dragon Defender
-All nex armours

[size=1.35em]Minigames:
[/size]

  • Assault
  • Recipe for Disaster
  • Nomad and Angry Goblin
  • Warriors Guild
  • Fight Caves
  • Pest Control
  • Barrows
  • Duel Arena
  • Fight Pits

[size=1.35em]Media: More coming soon.
[/size]
